template.subject: Account activation
template.body:
{emailLogo}

Thank-you for creating an account for the PRS exemptions register.

Your account has been created and your username is {name}

You now need to complete your registration and activate your account.

{registrationActivation}

If the link does not work, copy the text below and paste it into the address bar of your web browser. This will take you to the account activation page.

{activationText}

Next, copy the reference below and paste it into the box on the account activation page.

{activationCode}

This email is only valid for 24 hours from the time that you first registered. If you don't activate your account in that time you can get a new activation email using the 'Forgotten password' option.

Please note that terms and conditions apply to your account.

This email was sent from the {website}.

template.subject: Exemption registration
template.body:
{emailLogo}

Your exemption has been registered successfully.

{propertyAddress}

{exemptionType}

The exemption reference is {exemptionReference}.

As this is a self-certification register, you do not need to do anything else, and now you can rely on your registered exemption to let your property.

The Enforcing Authority will not contact you to validate this exemption and will only contact you if they have a query about the information you have registered.

This email was sent from the {url}

template.subject: Exemption registration
template.body:
{emailLogo}

You are the landlord of {propertyAddress}

An exemption has been registered for this property on {url}

The reason for the exemption is:

{exemptionType}

The exemption reference is {exemptionReference}.

The exemption was registered on your behalf by {agentName}, {agentAddress}

As the landlord, it is your responsibility to make sure that the exemption is correct. You can be fined up to {maxValueForExemptionType} if the information is false or misleading.

As this is a self-certification register, you do not need to do anything else, and the landlord can now rely on the registered exemption to let the property.

The Enforcing Authority will not contact you or the landlord to validate this exemption and will only contact you if they have a query about the exemption information you have registered.

You should contact {agentName} if you have any queries.

This email was sent from the {url}
